input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item name.

Item name:
Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose

Item keywords:
Maximum leak protection
40% more vinyl and wire than heavy-duty hoses
Extra heavy-duty 0.054 diameter wire can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing
30 coils per foot creates the smoothest interior for complete waste removal
Use for full-time and semi-permanent RVing

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose is an extra heavy-duty drain hose that can be used for full-time and semi-permanent RVing.  It is 30 coils per foot, and has an extra heavy-duty 0.054 diameter wire that can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing.  The 40% more vinyl and wire than heavy-duty hoses creates the smoothest interior for complete waste removal.  It is a triple wrap design with a plastic cover for maximum leak protection.  The drain hose is easy to install and use and provides a secure connection for your RV waste system.
input_text.Response B: The Valterra EZ Flush Drain Hose is a heavy-duty hose that offers maximum leak protection. It has 40% more vinyl and wire than standard heavy-duty hoses, making it extra strong and durable. The 0.054 diameter wire can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing, and the 30 coils per foot creates a smooth interior for complete waste removal. This hose is ideal for full-time and semi-permanent RVing, as it provides maximum durability and leak protection.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
